title: UCDOAggregatedStatus
description: JSON Schema for Log Analytics table: UCDOAggregatedStatus

AzureADDeviceId.description: A GUID corresponding to the AAD tenant to which the device belongs.

AzureADTenantId.description: A GUID corresponding to this device's AAD device ID.

BWOptPercent28Days.description: Bandwidth optimization (as a percentage of savings of total bandwidth otherwise incurred) as a result of using delivery optimization for this device, computed on a rolling 28-day basis.

BytesFromCache.description: Total number of bytes downloaded from cache.

BytesFromCDN.description: Total number of bytes downloaded from a CDN versus a peer. This counts against bandwidth optimization.

BytesFromGroupPeers.description: Total number of bytes downloaded from group peers.

BytesFromIntPeers.description: Total number of bytes downloaded from internet peers.

BytesFromPeers.description: Total number of bytes downloaded from peers.

ContentType.description: The type of content being downloaded.

SourceSystem.description: The type of agent the event was collected by. For example, OpsManager for Windows agent, either direct connect or Operations Manager, Linux for all Linux agents, or Azure for Azure Diagnostics

TimeGenerated.description: Time at which this event was generated.
